is.merkor.core.cli
Class MerkorCommandLineQueries

java.lang.Object
  is.merkor.core.cli.MerkorCommandLineQueries

public class MerkorCommandLineQueries
extends java.lang.Object

Processes queries to the MerkOr Redis resource, the methods mostly return lists of strings for displaying the results e.g. in a shell.

Version:
0.8
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir
